channel.title: Keep or Remove - Ice Barrage Multi hit
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/33nutyq.jpg[/img] Shall I have this on my server? :|
Or should I Add that you hit on nearby npc's instead of multi targeting in wilderness?

item.title: Keep or Remove - Ice Barrage Multi hit
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Lol, notta problem. My server is a full fledge PK server, just no codes for lvls. I have pk minigames, funpk, training with pking (exept when u first start, you start in a safe zone with training, but u cant get back once you read combat lvl 80)… anything that can, will involve pking lol. I just took this out of my server when i got it though, because it seemed to get abused too much.

Hehe, sounds awsome

Owner Nader:

Remove the multi, Because when you fighting 1v1 and you use it then its attack other :eek:

Yeh I might do that
It was just a cool thing, lulz… My friends tryed to pile me and i koed them hehe ;D :rolleyes:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:7, topic:286749”]Ow lol,
Your Choise;)
but my suggestion its to change it,
Reason: When you in clan and you finde someone and attack him, then its attack all ur clan/team’s ,
So My suggestion is to remove :d
remember its your choise ;)[/quote]

Heh, I didn’t think of that haha (removing it)

Read full topic
item.source: Keep or Remove - Ice Barrage Multi hit

[/quote]
You can acually add protections from that.[/quote]Ow lol,
Your Choise;)
but my suggestion its to change it,
Reason: When you in clan and you finde someone and attack him, then its attack all ur clan/team’s ,
So My suggestion is to remove :d
remember its your choise

item.title: Keep or Remove - Ice Barrage Multi hit
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“gon3d34d123, post:3, topic:286749”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=379211.msg2851888#msg2851888 date=1246580097]
I would get rid of it, causes alot of pking problems. For NPC’s its not too bad, but for PKing, i would narrow it down to the 1 block over, instead of 3. That way people know not to get too close to your kill.
[/quote]

Ok, Thanx for feedback
~
Linus[/quote]
Lol, notta problem. My server is a full fledge PK server, just no codes for lvls. I have pk minigames, funpk, training with pking (exept when u first start, you start in a safe zone with training, but u cant get back once you read combat lvl 80)… anything that can, will involve pking lol. I just took this out of my server when i got it though, because it seemed to get abused too much.

Read full topic

item.title: Keep or Remove - Ice Barrage Multi hit
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

CoonHunter:

I would get rid of it, causes alot of pking problems. For NPC’s its not too bad, but for PKing, i would narrow it down to the 1 block over, instead of 3. That way people know not to get too close to your kill.

Ok, Thanx for feedback
~
Linus
